column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We went on a Monday night around 8
column2: expecting there wouldn't be that much of a wait on a Monday so late. Boy were we wrong. The hostess said there would be an hour wait
column3: but we could order it to go and have the food within 30 minutes. We went with this offer originally
column4: but once we realized how cold it was outside
column5: we decided to ask to hostess to put us on the wait for a table. About 30 minutes we
column6: we decided to check in to see how much longer the wait with. Apparently there was a mix up and our name was taken off the list completely. They said they would solve it and get us a table soon. About 30 minutes later
column7: we asked about for the approximate wait. They had never solved the issue.
